item.title: Implement a Token Swap from the Base chain to Bitcoin for cross-chain transactions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Swapping ICY tokens for Bitcoin means exchanging one type of digital currency for another across different blockchain systems. Since ICY tokens (on the Base chain) and Bitcoin (on its own blockchain) operate on incompatible networks, specific tools are needed to make this process work.
